description: Expert-level integrated system design with thermal, EMI, and multi-domain optimization

problems.prompt: Magnetic Confinement Fusion Plasma Heating RF Supply: ITER-class tokamak requiring high-power RF generation for ion cyclotron heating
constraints: RF frequency tunable 40-55 MHz for ICRH
Fast shutdown < 10 µs for plasma disruption
problems.application: ITER-class tokamak requiring high-power RF generation for ion cyclotron heating

problems.prompt: Extreme UV Lithography Source Power: EUV scanner requiring pulsed power for laser-produced plasma light source
problems.application: EUV scanner requiring pulsed power for laser-produced plasma light source

problems.prompt: Satellite Formation Flying Propulsion: Precision formation flying satellites requiring micro-Newton thrust control
constraints: Thrust resolution 100 nN for formation control
Position accuracy ±1 mm over 100 km baseline
problems.application: Precision formation flying satellites requiring micro-Newton thrust control

problems.prompt: HVDC Cable Monitoring Power Injection: Subsea HVDC transmission requiring distributed monitoring power along cable route
problems.application: Subsea HVDC transmission requiring distributed monitoring power along cable route

problems.prompt: Quantum Memory Magneto-Optical Trap Power: Quantum network node requiring ultra-stable power for atomic ensemble trapping
constraints: Magnetic field noise < 1 nT/√Hz for trap stability
problems.application: Quantum network node requiring ultra-stable power for atomic ensemble trapping

problems.prompt: Free Electron Laser Undulator Trim Supply: X-ray FEL requiring precision undulator trim coil power for photon beam tuning
constraints: Current stability ±10 ppm for beam quality
problems.application: X-ray FEL requiring precision undulator trim coil power for photon beam tuning

problems.prompt: Cryogenic Hydrogen Storage Pump Drive: Liquid hydrogen infrastructure requiring pumping power at 20 Kelvin
constraints: Operation in liquid hydrogen at 20 K
problems.application: Liquid hydrogen infrastructure requiring pumping power at 20 Kelvin

problems.prompt: Gravitational Reference Sensor Power: Space-based gravitational wave detector requiring ultra-quiet proof mass control
problems.application: Space-based gravitational wave detector requiring ultra-quiet proof mass control

problems.prompt: Antimatter Trap Electrode Power System: CERN-class antihydrogen experiment requiring Penning trap electrode power
constraints: Voltage stability ±1 ppm for trap depth
problems.application: CERN-class antihydrogen experiment requiring Penning trap electrode power

problems.prompt: Synchrotron Light Source Insertion Device Power: 4th generation synchrotron requiring wiggler/undulator magnet power supply
constraints: Current ripple < 10 ppm for photon stability
Fast field ramp for energy scanning
problems.application: 4th generation synchrotron requiring wiggler/undulator magnet power supply
